data.persona: I am provided a special place to sleep. I may be tired after my travels. I am furnished with warm hospitality and a good meal.
data.description:
You are in the mansion entrance.
The mansion entrance room is very large and you can see up multiple stories. There is natural light from stained glass windows. The floors and the staircase at the far side of the room are made of fine marble. There are paintings of the baron and his family on the walls. There are ornate decorations and trinkets on tables against the wall.
The maid and the chef are here.

You are carrying an sleeping bag, a lace handkerchief, an umbrella, and a Handkerchief.

data.short_motivation: I give the lace handkerchief to maid so she could wash it for me
data.mid_motivation: I feel much better after the meal made by the chef and ready to go to sleep inside my sleeping bag and get ready for the next expenditure
data.long_motivation: I usually come back to this place to visit my friends, the chef and the maid, and tell them different stories that I have experienced from the outside world.
